## Checklist

- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated (`npm test`)
- [ ] E2E tests updated (if UI changed) (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Builds successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CONTRIBUTING/CHANGELOG)
- [ ] Handles corrupt `.hhh` files gracefully

Note: Reviews are conducted by volunteer maintainers as availability allows; timelines or outcomes are not guaranteed.
